items.text: not short enough for a pull and too close to off stump, flapped away down the ground
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Mendis, no run

items.text: full-toss on the leg stump, clipped away to deep midwicket
items.postText: SV: "A revolving door of players, captains and strategies has left Sri Lankan Cricket in a state of despair. It's ok to lose, but the defeatist attitude of this team is off-putting."
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Mendis, 1 run

items.text: short and slanting away outside off, steered to deep third man
items.postText: SV: "It's clear now that Bangladesh are on their to becoming a permanent fixture in the top 6 very soon. Sadly, it's equally clear that Sri Lanka is at the bottom of the barrel right now, and will probably remain so until the selectors get their act together and create a long term strategy for revamping the team."
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Tharanga, 1 run

items.text: full and veering down leg, grazes the pad and rolls fine past the diving keeper
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Mendis, 4 leg byes

items.text: leg-stump half-volley, flicked out to deep midwicket
items.postText: nishan: "Just as dot balls build pressure on batsman, singles build the pressure on bowlers, SL seem to have lost the art of taking singles, you are putting yourself under pressure to hit boundaries all the time, only WI can possibly pull that off."
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Mendis, 2 runs

items.preText: Sarvesh : "This Tri-Series is a contest among equals. Well, Bangladesh with slightly their nose head. Never thought Zimbabwe and Bangladesh would make a Tri-Series this much interesting. "
items.text: Mendis can't get on top of this short ball outside off. He still dares to pull it over midwicket. Instead, he splices it straighter over mid-on
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Mendis, 2 runs

items.text: back of a length and jags away outside off, Tharanga swats across the line, loses his shape, and misses the ball
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Tharanga, no run

items.text: full shooter outside off, sneaks under Tharanga's bat
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Tharanga, no run

items.preText: jordan albert: "@Masud: Nasir dropped a lollipop in last match and made a duck today. I don't know why people have too much hype about him. check his last 10 international matches performance. I don't see any reason for him to be in the team"
items.text: short and outside off, cut to square third man
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Tharanga, 1 run

items.text: Mendis rises on top of this short ball outside off and punches to backward point
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mendis, no run

items.text: short, slanting in to cramp Mendis for room, flapped out to short midwicket
items.postText: Sachith: "@nishan, sooo true. This is the biggest issue with SL batsmen right now. Even Thilan and Hathurusignhe combination coldn't fix that error." --- Give the new coaching staff some time, guys
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mendis, no run

items.text: on a good length and nips away outside off, opens the face and dabs ethe ball to backward point
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mendis, no run

items.text: Tharanga opens the face and drives from a fourth-stump line to backward point
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Tharanga, no run

items.text: Tamim runs back from mid-on, pulls out a sprawling dive, but could not even get his hands to the ball. Great commitment from Tamim, though. The batsman aimed a loft but only sliced in the air
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Tharanga, 2 runs

items.text: full on middle, defended back
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Tharanga, no run

items.text: tucked off the hips to deep square leg
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Tharanga, 1 run

items.text: bouncer just outside off, one for the over says the umpire, the batsman ducks under
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Mendis, no run

items.text: Rubel hits the bat as opposed to bat hitting the ball. Defended on off stump
items.postText: Rajput: "Am I the only one who feels that Mendis has no method of scoring runs when the ball is outside off in the powerplay? Very rarely do you see him drive balls to the fence. In test cricket you get gaps in the field but in ODI's it's a totally different case. The Indian team gave him nothing on the pads in August and we saw the results."
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Mendis, no run

items.text: full on middle, run back past the right of the diving bowler
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Tharanga, 1 run

items.preText: Mendis seems to be in some discomfort and calls for medical attention. Hamstring problem? Sri Lanka don't want him to join Mathews on the injury list. Tharanga, meanwhile, chats with his Sylhet Sixers team-mate Nasir. Mendis will resume soon
items.text: back of a length indipper, finishes on off, Mendis looks to play across the line and ends up leading-edging it in front of the bowler
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mendis, no run

items.text: short-arm jabbed off the hips to square leg
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mendis, 1 run

items.text: hip-high short ball outside off, swivels and pulls to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Tharanga, 1 run

items.text: full and outside off, dabbed away to deep third man
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mendis, 1 run

items.text: offcutter on the pads, tickled away fine of short fine leg. The fielder tumbles and takes some pace off the ball
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Tharanga, 3 runs

items.text: full on middle, Tharanga has a short stride as he pushes to cover
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Tharanga, no run
